originalText.text: In January of 2019, I received news of my beloved Uncle's passing.  Distraught and panicked, I called Cruise Planners NYC's Fern Llamas Robles.  I haven't been back to the Philippines in ages and I did not know where to start.  Fern listened to me intently in between my sobbing to figure out the best itinerary for me.  I had budget limitations and my work schedule was tight, however, she totally worked around both obstacles and booked the best flights that accommodated both my budget and work schedule.  She was very professional, considerate of my situation, and sincerely willing to find the best deal for me at the expense of her not even getting much commission just as long as she can get me to my destination.  To this date, I am very thankful that Fern was there for me when I needed help the most.  The next time I travel, and hopefully, soon - I trust Cruise Planners NYC will provide me the best experience again!

originalText.text: Cruise Planners NYC headed by Fern Robles made my family's Holy Week trip exciting and memorable! With Robles' help, we were able to maximize our time with every destination we visited.

originalText.text: Very professional. Planned my family trip very well. Caring nice person. Always responded back to my questions right away. Worked with my budget and found great deals. I would highly recommenced Fern!
